cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4620, a bill to amend the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 to limit the exemption provided for family offices from the definition of an investment adviser, and for other purposes

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 129 (Thursday, July 22, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. OCASIO-CORTEZ:
H.R. 4620.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8
[Page H3845]

latestAction.text: Ordered to be Reported in the Nature of a Substitute (Amended) by the Yeas and Nays: 27 - 22.

title: To amend the Investment Advisers Act of 1940 to limit the exemption provided for family offices from the definition of an investment adviser, and for other purposes.
